constraints.name: single_squid_movement
constraints.description: 在每个时刻，最多只有一个鱿鱼可以移动。
constraints.formal: At any time t, at most one squid can move.

constraints.name: shark_eats_squid
constraints.description: 如果在某一时刻鲨鱼和鱿鱼处于同一位置，则鲨鱼会吃掉鱿鱼。
constraints.formal: If at any time t, the position of a squid is equal to the position of the shark, the squid is eaten by the shark.

constraints.name: safe_shelter
constraints.description: 鱿鱼到达避难所且避难所上方没有鲨鱼时，鱿鱼就安全了，不再受到威胁。
constraints.formal: A squid is safe if it reaches the shelter and the shark is not at the shelter's position.

constraints.name: no_initial_overlap
constraints.description: 初始时，没有任何鱿鱼与鲨鱼或避难所在同一位置。
constraints.formal: Initially, no squid is at the same position as the shark or the shelter (x_i ≠ y and x_i ≠ z for all i).
